DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Radiance, it loses HP equal to its total Radiance. If you have Radiance, your attacks have base damage increased by #b5% per stack or increased up to the amount of stacks you have, whichever is greater. Whenever a character gains Radiance, it loses #b1 Radiance at the end of its turn.
You can target #rANY character with this card. Consume #b1 #yRadiance from the character to trigger an effect.
If a #yFading card is in your discard pile, it is #yExhausted. After playing a #yFading card, it becomes #yFaded. #yFaded cards can only apply #b1 #yRadiance at a time.
If a #yFaded card is in your discard pile, it is #yExhausted. #yFaded cards can only apply #b1 #yRadiance at a time.

Return the bottom-most #yGlaring card in your exhaust pile to your hand. NL If you have none, return the bottom-most #yFading #yRadiance card. NL If you have none, return the bottom-most #yFaded #yRadiance card.
The first time played each combat, convert an amount of Gold into #yBrilliance. If you do not have enough Gold, gain #b1 #yFrail and #yWeak instead.
When played, add a #yRepression to the bottom of your exhaust pile. #yRepression cards have #yGlaring and are #yRecalled first.
Trigger an effect when moved by a #yRecall effect.
If a Dim card is in your discard pile, it is #yPurged.
Characters with Blur do not lose Block at the start of turn.
Characters with Barricade do not lose Block at the start of turn.
Mari's devilish assistant randomly picks from a set of base game cards.
Mari's devilish assistant picks from a set of base game cards. NL She tries her best to pick the card you need.
